data.name: Express Warranty
data.description:
Repairs or a replacement for a faulty product within a specified
                                time period after it was purchased.

data.name: Special warranty
data.description:
Seller of the property(grantor) warrants only against anything
                                that occurred during their physical ownership.

data.name: Implied Warranty
data.description:
Assurances that a product is fit for the purpose that it is
                                intended and that it is merchantable.
